description: Description Let the fantasy begin and live on with this fabulous hat. With this lovely jester hat you can stand out in the crowd! You can give this Jester Hat to your families to help them dress up as their favorite Clown, so that they can enjoy the happy Halloween and make good memories. Jingle Bell: The cap has 7 horns, each with a small metal bell attached. Material: 100% cloth, the hat with Jingle Bell convinces with maximum comfort. Soft Hat: Multi- colored clown hat is suitable for many disguises at carnival, Halloween, themed parties or clown cosplay. The headgear has a standard size for adults, women and men. Clown Hat also great for masquerade party, cosplay party or Christmas Xmas holiday party.This is ideal for different activities such as: stage performances, dance groups, recitals or to wear as part of your Halloween costume. Features - Color: multi - Material: Cloth. - Size: Approx. 28x25x2cm. Note: * Colors may have slight differences due to different screens. * Please allow a small size error due to manual measurement. * If you have any questions or problems during use, please contact us and we will be at your service. Package Including 1 x Clown hat
